Question
========
Which project is the best fit for using GitHub?

Answerlist
----------
* A single large video file edited by one person
* A shared Word document edited at the same time by many people
* A project with many small text files where collaborators work on different parts
* A folder of scanned PDFs that need to be edited in place

Solution
========
GitHub works best for many small text files and collaboration across different parts of a project.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
